full_summary:
### Notice of Proposed Procurement

#### Solicitation for Request for Proposal

**Title:** Filter, Fluid
**Reference Number:** PW-22-01012369
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** W8485-237349/A

**Opening Date:** November 3rd, 2022
**Closing Date:** December 2nd, 2022 at 2:00 p.m.

**Proposed Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence, 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A0K2
**End-User Entities:** Department of National Defence

**Notice Description:**

The Department of National Defence invites bidders to submit proposals for the delivery of engineering fuel system components and filter systems for use in non-aircraft applications. The bid solicitation includes two items:

* Item 1: GSIN 2910, NSN 01-242-5196, Fluid Filter, Part Number: 50C-0010-2, NCAGE: 19062, Quantity: 25 units.
* Item 2: GSIN 2940, NSN 00-244-3610, Fluid Filter, Part Number: 113033FRU, NCAGE: 14487, Quantity: 25 units.

Bid proposals must be submitted in either official language of Canada. Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, bidders are encouraged to submit their proposals electronically using the epost Connect service.

**Contract Term NOTE:** If you need to know that when the procured items are needed for the government to start the work with the contractor,

**Selection Criteria:**

The Department of National Defence will select the bidder(s) who meet the requirements and offer the best value to the government. Bids will be evaluated based on the criteria outlined in the bid solicitation documents.

**Trade Agreement:**

This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Language:**

Documents may be presented in either official language of Canada.

**Contact Information:**

Danny Lebel, Defense Procurement and Contractual Services, [dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca](mailto:dany.lebel2@forces.gc.ca)

**Document attachments:**
[English version](<https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/03/58c73cc69786d542a98af2f812321c3d/w8485-237349a_bid_solicitation_en
